entry.title: Welcome 2016
entry.content:
Welcome 2016!

I realized only now that the previous entry on my blog was posted almost an year ago!

Looking back, a lot of good things did happen in the year of 2015 - both professionally and personally; but blogging was definitely not one of them.

This entry is basically an attempt (yet another attempt is more right) to break the shell and to start writing again - here's hoping that there would be a lot of posts that gets added to this blog in this year!

Happy New Year !
